properties.name: spring.test.mockmvc.htmlunit.url
properties.description: URL to use when HtmlUnit expands relative paths.

properties.name: spring.test.mockmvc.htmlunit.webclient.enabled
properties.description: Whether HTMLUnit's WebClient should be auto-configured when it's on the classpath.

properties.name: spring.test.mockmvc.htmlunit.webdriver.enabled
properties.description: Whether Selenium's WebDriver should be auto-configured when it's on the classpath.
